summary: This mod replaces the legion shield with an oval shield inspired by the kind used by the late Roman army. There might be a bug where the shield disappears when dropped, probably related to the collision mesh. It still works fine.
descriptionHtml: This mod replaces the legion shield with an oval shield inspired by the kind used by the late Roman army. There might be a bug where the shield disappears when dropped, probably related to the collision mesh. It still works fine.
author: Fimbulvitir
